snippet: Though Susan Combs, Texas’ comptroller, grossly underestimated the state’s revenues two years ago, the error was politically helpful to the conservative Legislature.
lead_paragraph: Though Susan Combs, Texas’ comptroller, grossly underestimated the state’s revenues two years ago, the error was politically helpful to the conservative Legislature.

headline.seo: Bad Texas Budget Estimate Fit Well With Prevailing Politics
headline.main: A Bad Budget Estimate Fit Nicely With Prevailing Politics
headline.print_headline: A Bad Budget Estimate Fit Nicely With Prevailing Politics
